verses.text: I \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w Phebe|strong="G5402"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w*, which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* a \w servant|strong="G1249"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cenchrea|strong="G2747"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w receive|strong="G4327"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, as \w becometh|strong="G0516"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w assist|strong="G3936"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G0302"\w* \w business|strong="G4229"\w* she hath \w need|strong="G5535"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w been|strong="G1096"\w* a \w succourer|strong="G4368"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w myself|strong="G1700"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w helpers|strong="G4904"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* \w have|strong="G5294"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* laid \w down|strong="G5294"\w* their \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w necks|strong="G5137"\w*: unto \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G2532"\w* \add greet\add* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* that is \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*. \w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w wellbeloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Epaenetus|strong="G1866"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="G0536"\w* of \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w bestowed|strong="G2872"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Andronicus|strong="G0408"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Junia|strong="G2458"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="G4773"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w fellowprisoners|strong="G4869"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* of \w note|strong="G1978"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.
\w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w Amplias|strong="G0291"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Urbane|strong="G3773"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w helper|strong="G4904"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Stachys|strong="G4720"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Apelles|strong="G0559"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*. \w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* them which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Aristobulusâ€™|strong="G0711"\w* \add household\add*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Herodion|strong="G2267"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w kinsman|strong="G4773"\w*. \w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* them that \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3488"\w* \add household\add* of \w Narcissus|strong="G3488"\w*, which \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Tryphena|strong="G5170"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Tryphosa|strong="G5173"\w*, who \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* the \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Persis|strong="G4069"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w laboured|strong="G2872"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Rufus|strong="G4504"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mine|strong="G1700"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Asyncritus|strong="G0799"\w*, \w Phlegon|strong="G5393"\w*, \w Hermas|strong="G2057"\w*, \w Patrobas|strong="G3969"\w*, \w Hermes|strong="G2060"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* which are \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Philologus|strong="G5378"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Julia|strong="G2456"\w*, \w Nereus|strong="G3517"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Olympas|strong="G3652"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* which are \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w an|strong="G5370"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*. The \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w mark|strong="G4648"\w* them which \w cause|strong="G4160"\w* \w divisions|strong="G1370"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offences|strong="G4625"\w* contrary \w to|strong="G3844"\w* the \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* have \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w avoid|strong="G1578"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they that are \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* their \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w belly|strong="G2836"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* good \w words|strong="G5542"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fair \w speeches|strong="G2129"\w* \w deceive|strong="G1818"\w* the \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* of the \w simple|strong="G0172"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* is come \w abroad|strong="G0864"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*. I am \w glad|strong="G5463"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5213"\w* \w behalf|strong="G1909"\w*: but \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* I would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w simple|strong="G0185"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* shall \w bruise|strong="G4937"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w*. The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w workfellow|strong="G4904"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sosipater|strong="G4989"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="G4773"\w*, \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Tertius|strong="G5060"\w*, who \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \add this\add* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*, \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Gaius|strong="G1050"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w host|strong="G3581"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w the|strong="G1577"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w saluteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*. \w Erastus|strong="G2037"\w* the \w chamberlain|strong="G3623"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w saluteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Quartus|strong="G2890"\w* a \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* to him that is of \w power|strong="G1410"\w* to \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* of the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*, which was kept \w secret|strong="G4601"\w* since the world \w began|strong="G0166"\w*,

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* is made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="G4397"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w* of \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

To \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. Written to the Romans from Corinthus, \add and sent\add* by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
